scripts.build: node scripts/embed-feed-images.mjs && node --no-deprecation ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build --mode code && node --no-deprecation ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build --mode ui
scripts.build:prod: node -e "if(!process.env.VITE_BACKEND_URL){console.error('Defina VITE_BACKEND_URL (ex: VITE_BACKEND_URL=https://seu-projeto.vercel.app/api npm run build:prod)');process.exit(1)}" && npm run build
